text: Method : The bronchial epithelial cell lines BEAS - 2B and HBEc14 - KT were cultured and then treated with PGE 2 . PDK1 small interfering RNA ( siRNA ) and a PDK1 inhibitor , an antagonist of the PGE 2 receptor subtype EP4 and EP4 siRNA , c - Jun siRNA , and overexpressions of c - Jun and PDK1 have been used to evaluate the effects on cell proliferation .
